tool.name: GenomeSpace Importer
tool.command: genomespace_importer.py --genomespace_site "prod" #assert $__user__, Exception( 'You must be logged in to use this tool.' ) #set $username = $__user__.preferences.get( 'genomespace_username', None ) #set $token = $__user__.preferences.get( 'genomespace_token', None ) #assert None not in ( $username, $token ), Exception( 'You must associate a GenomeSpace OpenID with your account and log in with it.' ) --username "${username}" --token "${token}" --json_parameter_file "${output_file1}"
